meanings.definition: The quality or state of being red or ruddy in complexion.
meanings.sent1: Her rubicundity was evident after spending the day in the sun.
meanings.sent2: His rubicundity made him stand out in the crowd.
meanings.sent3: The clown's exaggerated rubicundity made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: The sunset painted the sky with a rubicundity that took her breath away.
meanings.sent5: The artist captured the rubicundity of the autumn leaves in his painting.

meanings.sent2: She tried to hide her rubicundity with makeup.
meanings.sent3: The comedian joked about his own rubicundity on stage.
meanings.sent4: The rubicundity of the apple signaled its ripeness.
meanings.sent5: The old painting depicted the rubicundity of the cheeks in great detail.
